reviews.review: Great game, used to be better but its still kinda good now

This game is fun sometimes. but most of the time you're subject to a wayward community that comes with all competitive Esports. I would not reccomend this game unless you want to suffer for 100 hours before u really start getting the hang of it. after that its not too bad.
good game, shitty trusted mode update
ТОП ШУТЕР ЛЮБЛЮ ОЧЕНЬ МНОГО ЧЕГО КРУТОГО НО КОМЬЮНИТИ ХЕРНЯ НО ИГРА НЕ ВИНОВАТА И КИ БИБЕРСПОРТ ЕСТЬ И МНОГО ЧЕГО ДРУГОГО ВАЩЕ ТОПЧИК
I don't consider myself good at the game at all, it's still really fun to play. If you're into the competitive scene of games as well as FPS games, you should take a look at CS:GO.

CSGO ist halt das Mario Kart der idle clicker. Die Einführung kosmetischer Items und des daraus resultierenden Marktes (als Metagame) hat das Spiel erst richtig populär gemacht und gerettet. Nach ca 200.000 h machts mir immer noch Spass. Der größte Minuspunkt ist aber, das sie aztec rausgenommen haben. Deshalb nur eine 9.9/10.
fucking cheaters in every fucking game
